text: Rwose ba bandi bavuze bati “Mu by’ukuri, Mesiya (Yesu), mwene Mariyamu (Mariya) ni we Mana)”, barahakanye. Nyamara Mesiya yaravuze ati “Yemwe bene Isiraheli! Nimusenge Allah (wenyine), Nyagasani wanjye akaba na Nyagasani wanyu.” Mu by’ukuri, ubangikanya Allah, rwose Allah yamuziririje (kuzinjira mu) Ijuru ndetse icyicaro cye kizaba mu muriro. Kandi inkozi z’ibibi ntizizabona abazitabara
